snippet: This music festival in Knoxville, Tenn., in its fifth iteration, doesn’t suffer the formulaic stasis of so many festivals.
abstract: Ben Ratliff Critic's Notebook discusses highlights from Big Ears Festival in Knoxville, Tenn; notes event features surprisingly diverse range of electronic, classical, improvised and guitar music that resists commercial classification.
lead_paragraph: This music festival in Knoxville, Tenn., in its fifth iteration, doesn’t suffer the formulaic stasis of so many festivals.

headline.main: Big Ears Festival Resists Commercial and Genre Constraints
headline.print_headline: A Music Festival Resists Commercial Constraints
